text: The Scotland Office (SO) ensures the smooth working of the devolution settlement in Scotland. The SO represents Scottish interests within the UK government and represents the UK government in Scotland. ==Ministers== Minister Portfolio Secretary of State for Scotland Promotes and protects the devolution settlement Minister for Scottish Stakeholders *Supports The Secretary of State for Scotland on ministerial matters *Engages with Scottish stakeholders on a wide range of matters relating to the UK Parliament *Representative of Scottish interests through a total of 22 Cabinet committees and subcommittees (including the National Economic Council, Domestic Affairs, Life Chances, Constitution and Legislation) Office Category:Government agencies of the United Kingdom Category:Organisations based in London
title: Scotland Office
